TICKET001.subject: Slow internet speeds
TICKET001.description: Customer reporting slower than expected internet speeds on fiber connection
TICKET001.resolution: Replaced WiFi router with newer model. Speed test confirmed full gigabit speeds.

TICKET002.subject: Incorrect charges on bill
TICKET002.description: Customer disputing charges for premium channels not ordered

notes.note: Customer called about unexpected premium channel charges. Investigating billing records.
Found system error that auto-added premium channels. Preparing credit for customer.

TICKET003.subject: Business line not receiving calls
TICKET003.description: Main business line (555) 456-7890 not receiving incoming calls since yesterday

notes.note: Customer reports main business line not receiving calls. Checking network routing.
Found routing issue in business phone system. Working with network team to resolve.
Network team identified configuration error. Fix scheduled for tonight's maintenance window.

TICKET004.subject: Account suspended - payment dispute
TICKET004.description: Customer's account suspended but claims payment was made. Needs immediate resolution.

notes.note: Customer claims payment made but account shows suspended for non-payment. Investigating.
Payment processing team confirms payment was received but not properly applied to account.
Escalated case. Working with billing team to restore service and apply payment correctly.

TICKET005.subject: Remote control not working
TICKET005.description: TV remote control stopped working, customer needs replacement
TICKET005.resolution: Replacement remote control shipped to customer address. Delivered and confirmed working.

TICKET006.subject: Missing premium channels
TICKET006.description: Customer reports some premium channels not appearing in channel guide

notes.note: Customer opened ticket about missing premium channels. Will check account and send signal refresh.
